title: Ticket #2281: should_transfer_files and when_to_transfer_output now have defaults
description:
should_transfer_files defaults to IF_NEEDED

when_to_transfer_output defaults to ON_EXIT

Defaults are adjusted to avoid unnecessary conflicts, e.g. should_transfer_files=NO makes when_to_transfer_output=NEVER and when_to_transfer_output=ON_EXIT_OR_EVICT makes should_transfer_files=YES.

At least the condor_submit manual page and section 2.5.4 of the manual need to be updated.
